isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - SHORT SLEEPER AIR LINE CABINETS

svcsubproc.title: Install 2 Passenger Side Air Line Cabinets on Short Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 77
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position rear air line cabinet (Item 11) mounting tab on the back of the cabinet into mounting slot on sleeper wall (Item 12) and lower cabinet into place, passenger side shown.
Install four hex head bolts (Item 9) securing rear air line cabinet (Item 11) to upper passenger side sleeper wall (Item 12), passenger side shown. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.7 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Position front air line cabinet (Item 10) mounting tab on the back of the cabinet into mounting slot on sleeper wall (Item 12) and lower cabinet into place, passenger side shown.
Install four hex head bolts (Item 9) securing front air line cabinet (Item 10) to upper passenger side sleeper wall (Item 12), passenger side shown. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.7 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).

Install air line bracket assembly weld stud plate (Item 8, section A-A) through right side of front air line cabinet (Item 10) and into left side of rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown.
Install two cap retainer washers (Item 5, section A-A) over weld studs (Item 7, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown.
Install two hex nuts (Item 6, section A-A) on weld studs (Item 7, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.7 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Install two finishing caps (Item 4, section A-A) over cap retaining washers (Item 5, section A-A) inside rear air line cabinet (Item 11), passenger side shown.
Install two hex head bolts (Item 1) securing rear air line cabinet (Item 11) to the rear air line cabinet support (Item 3), passenger side shown. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.7 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Install two hex head bolts (Item 1) securing front air line cabinet (Item 10) to the front air line cabinet support (Item 2), passenger side shown. Tighten to 14.5 to 17.7 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m)
Repeat procedure to install two driver side air line cabinets on sleeper cab.
